lecture: Strelka Institute, The Terraforming: Do Images Exhale Oxygen?

February 04, 2020

As part of the new education program The Terraforming at Strelka Institute in Moscow, on Monday 10th February I will contribute with an online lecture -Do Images Exhale Oxygen? Visual circuits, latent surfaces and earthial growth- in the context of a course lead by Jussi Parikka on the speculative topic of a Natural History of Logistics and Infrastructure.

Spanish English
Abelardo Gil-Fournier - 2025
